title: New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act (IPRA) Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Dana A. Silver (September 7, 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act (IPRA), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) and vehicle dash camera footage related to the arrest of Dana A. Silver on or about September 7, 2024.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any law enforcement personnel during the stop, field sobriety testing, detention, arrest, and transport of Dana A. Silver.

All dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in the stop, detention, or transport.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the booking time is listed as 10:34 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM on September 7, 2024.

If any portions of the requested footage are exempt or confidential, please produce the non-exempt portions and cite the specific legal exemptions justifying any withholding or redaction.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor but request notification if the costs will exceed $50. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your attention to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Hawaii Uniform Information Practices Act, I hereby request the following records:

I would like documents pertaining to communication between the Maui Emergency Management Agency and Samaritan's Purse between August 8, 2023 and December 1, 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

title: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Darla Rachel Vidal (March 16, 2024)

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Darla Rachel Vidal (March 16, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, Chapter 119, I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to the arrest of Darla Rachel Vidal on or about March 16, 2024 near Pensacola Road, Big Pine, Monroe County, FL.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Monroe County Sheriff's Office personnel during the detention, investigation, or arrest of Darla Rachel Vidal.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. I understand the listed booking time is 2:30 PM; therefore, I request responsive footage from approximately 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM on March 16, 2024.

If any portions of the requested footage are exempt or confidential, please produce the non-exempt portions and cite the specific legal exemptions for any withholding or redactions.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor but request notification if the costs will exceed $50. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your attention to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Alexis T. Trent (April 25, 2024)

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Alexis T. Trent (April 25, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, Chapter 119, I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) and vehicle dash camera footage related to the arrest of Alexis T. Trent (DOB: 12/31/1969) on or about April 25, 2024 near 4000 Sombrero Boulevard, Marathon, Monroe County, FL.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Monroe County Sheriff's Office personnel during the initial stop, field sobriety testing, detention, arrest, and transport of Alexis T. Trent.

All dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in the stop, detention, or transport.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. I understand the listed booking time is 9:54 PM; therefore, I request responsive footage from approximately 8:30 PM to 11:30 PM on April 25, 2024.

If portions of the requested footage are exempt or confidential, please produce the non-exempt portions and cite the specific legal exemptions justifying any withholding or redaction.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor but request notification if the costs will exceed $50. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
